Title: 2027: Atiku declares mission to ‘save Nigeria’in Taraba
Summary: Former Vice President Atiku Abubakar stepped into Jalingo on Tuesday . The city buzzed with a different kind of political energy, one that hinted at a man preparing to redraw the map of his political journey .

Title: Oyo, Ogun, Lagos, Osun reassure residents on security during, after yuletide
Summary: Joint Security Stakeholders for Oyo, Ogun, Lagos and Osun states reassured residents of the South-West states that there will be adequate security and safety of lives and properties around their shared border areas and highways .

Title: PDP chair calls for review of security architecture
Summary: Tanimu Turaki suggested review of the current security architecture in Nigeria . The PDP Chairman made the suggestion when he led the National Working Committee (NWC) of the party .

Title: Aiyedatiwa approves recruitment of 500 Amotekun operatives
Summary: Governor of Ondo State approves recruitment of 500 Amotekun operatives . Lucky Aiyedatiwa approved recruitment and training of 500 new personnel for the state’s Security Network Agency .

Title: Document regarding officers’ withdrawal from VIP duties fake – Police
Summary: Document regarding officers’ withdrawal from VIP duties is fake – Police . The purported document has gone viral on social media . In a statement on Friday, the Force Public Relations Officer, CSP Benjamin Benjamin, said the document was fake .

Title: Africa faces cholera, Mpox, other emergencies amid funding boost
Summary: Africa is confronting multiple high-burden health emergencies, including widespread cholera outbreaks, rising Mpox cases and active viral haemorrhagic fever e. Africa faces widespread Mpox outbreaks, including rising M.pox cases .

Title: Why US boycotted G20 Summit in South Africa – Trump
Summary: Former U.S. President Donald Trump has offered a fiery explanation for why the United States boycotted the G20 Summit hosted in South Africa . Trump accuses the South African government of severe human-rights violations and refusing to cooperate with Washington’s diplomatic protocols .

Title: Plateau lost about 12,000 lives in 24 years — Gov Mutfwang
Summary: Plateau State Governor, Caleb Mutfwang, has raised fresh alarm over the scale and persistence of insecurity in the State . At least 420 communities have been attacked, leaving behind widespread displacement, loss of livelihoods, and humanitarian crises .

Title: Archbishop Osa-Oni to Leaders: You know what must be done to end insecurity
Summary: Archbishop John Osa-Oni has called on Nigeria’s leaders to take decisive and immediate action . He insisted that those in authority “know what to do” to end insecurity .

Title: Jailing of law professor, Nigeria’s watershed win against sexual abuse – ICPC
Summary: The Independent Corrupt Practices and Other Related Offences Commission (ICPC) says the conviction marks a watershed win in Nigeria’s fight against sexual offences .
